title: A treatise of the cohabitacyon of the faithfull with the vnfaithfull Whereunto is added. A sermon made of the confessing of Christe and his gospell, and of the denyinge of the same.
author: Vermigli, Pietro Martire, 1499-1562.
notes: The sermon is by Heinrich Bullinger, whose initials appear on I2r. It was possibly translated by Becon; original text not traced.
Identified as STC 24246 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
